en.name: Jason (Hsi-Chuan) Wang
en.aboutMeP1: Software R&D Engineer with approximately three years of team management experience, specializing in cross-platform development, backend services, and UI/UX design. I believe technology should solve real-world problems, not just be about writing code.
en.aboutMeP2: My core value is "delivering value, not just code." From proposing Server-Driven UI architecture and AI integration to user experience design, every project aims to solve problems and create value.
en.service1Desc: Focusing on designing and implementing consistent cross-platform user experiences. By introducing modern architectures like Server-Driven UI (SDUI), I can significantly reduce redundant development costs on iOS and Android and accelerate feature iteration for you.
en.service2Desc: Integrating large language models (like OpenAI) into your products and workflows. From automated data extraction to intelligent form generation, I can help you leverage AI to improve operational efficiency.
en.service3Desc: Starting from user and business needs to design intuitive and easy-to-use product interfaces and experiences. I can act as a bridge between technical teams and stakeholders to ensure product designs are accurately implemented.
en.service4Desc: Developing high-performance, high-stability native iOS applications using modern design patterns like MVVM. Familiar with the App Store submission process, I can handle the complete process from development to release for you.
en.skillLangDesc: Python, JavaScript, Java, Swift, Kotlin, TypeScript, HTML/CSS
en.skillAPIsDesc: OpenAI Assistant, Google Maps, LINE Messaging, RESTful
en.skillToolsDesc: Git, Figma, GCP, Cursor IDE, Gemini-CLI
en.sideProject1Desc: Architected and deployed a scalable RESTful API on GCP using Node.js, PostgreSQL. Utilized Cursor IDE and Gemini-CLI to accelerate development and optimize code quality.
en.sideProject2Desc: Developed an AI chatbot integrating OpenAI Assistant API and LINE Messaging API. Automated customer service processes to handle common questions, significantly reducing manual effort.
en.sideProject3Desc: Developed a custom Discord Bot to automate NFT ownership verification, performing on-chain wallet checks and automatically granting a 'Verified Holder' role upon success.
en.exp1Desc:
Team Management: Approx. 3 years of team management experience, responsible for project planning, progress tracking, and team coordination to ensure smooth project execution.
Core Projects: Led cross-platform SDK (ITIFKit), AI form generation tool (SmallCode), backend API development (Thinka), UI/UX design (HRDashboard), and native iOS apps (SHR App, Shift App).
en.exp2Desc: Responsible for the development and maintenance of iOS Apps, integrating payment and Bluetooth device connection functionalities. Participated in the App Store submission and review process to ensure product quality and user experience.

zh-TW.pageTitle: 王璽權 (Jason) - 軟體研發工程師
zh-TW.name: 王璽權 (Jason)
zh-TW.aboutMeP1: 擁有約三年團隊管理經驗的軟體研發工程師，專注於跨平台開發、後端服務和 UI/UX 設計。我相信技術應該解決實際問題，而不只是寫程式碼。
zh-TW.aboutMeP2: 我的核心價值是「交付價值，而不只是程式碼」。從 Server-Driven UI 架構提案、AI 整合，到使用者體驗設計，每個專案都以解決問題和創造價值為目標。
zh-TW.service1Desc: 專注於設計與實現一致的跨平台使用者體驗。透過導入 Server-Driven UI (SDUI) 等現代架構，能為您大幅降低在 iOS 和 Android 上的重複開發成本，並加速功能迭代。
zh-TW.service2Desc: 將大型語言模型（如 OpenAI）整合至您的產品與工作流中。從自動化資料擷取到智慧表單生成，我能協助您利用 AI 提升營運效率。
zh-TW.service3Desc: 從使用者與商業需求出發，設計直觀、易用的產品介面與體驗。我能擔任技術團隊與利害關係人之間的橋樑，確保產品設計精準落地。
zh-TW.service4Desc: 採用 MVVM 等現代設計模式開發高效能、高穩定性的原生 iOS 應用。熟悉 App Store 上架流程，能為您處理從開發到發布的完整過程。
zh-TW.skillLangDesc: Python, JavaScript, Java, Swift, Kotlin, TypeScript, HTML/CSS
zh-TW.skillAPIsDesc: OpenAI Assistant, Google Maps, LINE Messaging, RESTful
zh-TW.skillMgmtSub: 約三年經驗 • 敏捷開發 • 領導力
zh-TW.skillToolsDesc: Git, Figma, GCP, Cursor IDE, Gemini-CLI
zh-TW.sideProject1Desc: 在 GCP 上架構並部署可擴展的 RESTful API，使用 Node.js、PostgreSQL。 運用 Cursor IDE 和 Gemini-CLI 加速開發流程並優化程式碼品質。
zh-TW.sideProject2Desc: 開發 AI 聊天機器人，整合 OpenAI Assistant API 和 LINE Messaging API。 自動化客戶服務流程，處理常見問題，顯著降低人力成本。
zh-TW.sideProject3Desc: 開發自訂 Discord Bot，自動化 NFT 持有權驗證，執行鏈上錢包驗證， 驗證成功後自動授予「Verified Holder」角色。
zh-TW.exp1Company: 英特內軟體, 新北市
zh-TW.exp1Desc:
團隊管理：擁有約三年團隊管理經驗，負責專案規劃、進度追蹤與團隊協調，確保專案順利執行。
核心專案：領導跨平台 SDK (ITIFKit)、AI 表單生成工具 (SmallCode)、後端 API 開發 (Thinka)、UI/UX 設計 (HRDashboard)、iOS 原生應用 (SHR App, Shift App)。
zh-TW.exp2Desc: 負責 iOS App 的開發與維護，整合支付與 Bluetooth 裝置連線功能。 參與 App 上架與審核流程，確保產品品質與使用者體驗。
